subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Olympic Games
Speedskating
Short-Track Speedskating
lead_paragraph: Maier won the Olympic gold medal in the 5,000 meters at Grenoble in 1968 but lost the 10,000 in a surprising upset.
snippet: Maier won the Olympic gold medal in the 5,000 meters at Grenoble in 1968 but lost the 10,000 in a surprising upset.
